scripts.b: tsc && (mkdir dist || true) && mv src/*.js* dist/ && npm run build --prefix frontend && cp -r frontend/dist/* dist/
scripts.prod: tsc && (mkdir dist || true) && mv src/*.js* dist/ && npm run buildprod --prefix frontend && cp -r frontend/dist/* dist/
scripts.p: npm run prod && (rm dist/data.json || true) && scp -r dist/* pi@marand.dk:/home/pi/code/todo
